column4: ugh, i wish i'd ripped all my cd's as ogg, rencoding 5gb of mp3's to ogg is going to take a while :P
Daisuke_ido, i tested it out on a few before, i couldnt notice any difference
rip them to flac .. takes a little extra diskspace but you never have to rip them again.. converting between two lossy formats gives you the worst artifacts of both
problem is i can only do that for the ones i actually ripped, quite a few are from torrents :P
